name: Deep Woods (Nnaa)
description: Seeking the lost children, a lone woman ventures deep into the woods; further than she's ever been before... In this not-really-long exploration adventure game, you will meet the woods' troubled denizens, solve some not-really-difficult puzzles, get lost in some mazes, see some really unusual parts of the forest and try to save the young ones in the process... The game has two endings and was made in a few days using exclusively a creative tool called Mosi, which is available here, on itch, for free https://zenzoa.itch.io/mosi (thanks for the tool, Zenzoa, it's really cool ;P Also, please, let its users compose music with more than 5 notes per octave, thanks T_T No hard feelings over this, though ^.^')
